content.text:
# 24th Japan Record Awards

The 24th Japan Record Awards were held December 31, 1982. They recognized accomplishments by musicians from this year.
Award winners
*Japan Record Award:
**Takashi Hosokawa for "Kita Sakaba"
*Best Vocalist:
**Junko Ohashi
*Best New Artist:
**Shibugakitai
See also
*1982 in Japanese music
References
*[http://www.jacompa.or.jp/reco24.html Complete list of all winners]
